name: Hilton Garden Inn Toledo Perrysburg

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we had a wedding there over the weekend.
reviews.title: Nice hotel and nice

reviews.text: it was great actually. the place was nice, easy to get around and
reviews.title: Nice Hotel Overall

reviews.text: the service was top notch. everyone was nice.
reviews.title: Pretty good stay!

reviews.text: i think the building is practically new or something.
reviews.title: worth going out of your way for
Horrible experience with staff, ended up not staying

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel from Fri to Sun and did not have the noise issues with this hotel. The room was comfortably furnished; the bathroom was working and nicely stocked with the Neutrogena bathroom amenities. There was Starbucks coffee in-room and a fridge and microwave. The breakfast (not free) was filling and the dining room and service was good. The interior of the hotel is furnished modernly and remote printing came in handy. Overall, this hotel was not noisy (stayed on top floor) and the amenities we used was working properly and had no issues with this HGI.
reviews.title: Nice hotel and rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Purchased the Valentine's package. All was as promised. The room was comfortable and spacious.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, but very noisy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have traveled extensively and have stayed at many different hotels. This hotel was one of the noisest. Until 3:00 a.m., one could hear doors slamming, people talking and just about any other noise immaginable. Also, the covering on the bed is not conducive for sleeping. It is extremely hot.
reviews.title: I wouldn't say it was the best sleep I've ever had

reviews.text: I would choose another hotel for the price paid.
reviews.title: Nice and new- temp control out of wack

reviews.text: This is a nice clean new hotel. We also experienced the heating issue with the room becoming very warm and then the air turning on to bring the room to the correct temp. but in the mean time the air is very cold. The unit is also very loud.
reviews.title: Not a very good experience.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I spent one night here on a roadtrip en route to Wisconsin from NYC. We were glad we stayed here as the hotel is pretty new and it is situated in a shopping area that has the feel of a community. This place is very safe and after reading the local Toledo newspaper we were even more pleased to know that this place is "safer" than downtown Toledo as we had a lot of valuable memorabilia in the SUV that was parked in the lot. Our room was very clean, quiet and spacious. The water pressure of the shower was good and the toiletries were all neutrogena. We ate the 9.99 American Buffet Breakfast which was more than enough and the person serving us did a great job. She was very attentive unlike some buffet restaurants where no one ever comes back to refill your coffee, juice or take your order. You can also take Starbucks coffee from the buffet breakfast to go. We did that since we were off in the morning for a 10 hour drive.
reviews.title: A good place to stay right outside Toledo

reviews.text: Single night stay, fairly new HGI with all typical features found in HGI. My main issue with this property was the HVAC system. I found it particularly difficult to maintain a steady and comfortable temperature during my night's sleep.
reviews.title: Decent Stay, good for a night.

reviews.text: The gym was more than functional, the staff was friendly and helpful, the overall condition of the hotel was good. The room service that I ordered was brought in from a local place, not too bad but not anything I would have to go back for.
reviews.title: Everything as it should be...

reviews.text: Location is ok, seems like a pretty rural area but you can find all you need within a short drive.
reviews.title: Enjoyed our stay

reviews.text: All in all decent stay, stay again depends on the rate. This stay is was a bit expensive for what you get and what HGI is supposed to stand for. I paid just over 200 with a salad from room service and after all taxes, that to me is a bit high.
reviews.title: Very noisy

aka: Hilton Garden Inn Toledo Perrysburg Hotel
